epics.title: Task Management Core Functionality
epics.description: Develop the core features of the To-Do List application, enabling users to add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. This epic is critical to delivering the primary business value: allowing users to manage daily tasks efficiently.

stories.title: Add New Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to do.

subtasks.title: Design Add Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI components for task input fields and add button.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Handle form submission, validation, and state update for new tasks.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to accept new task data and store it.

subtasks.title: Test Add Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for adding tasks, including edge cases.

stories.title: Edit Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit the title and description of an existing task so I can update my tasks as needed.

subtasks.title: Design Edit Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for editing task details inline or in a modal.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Handle edit form state, validation, and update logic.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to update task details.

subtasks.title: Test Edit Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for editing tasks.

stories.title: Mark Task as Completed
stories.description: As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so I can track my progress.

subtasks.title: Design Completed Task UI
subtasks.description: Update task list UI to visually distinguish completed tasks.

subtasks.title: Implement Complete/Uncomplete Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Handle toggling of completed state for tasks.

subtasks.title: Implement Complete/Uncomplete Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to update task completion status.

subtasks.title: Test Mark as Completed Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for marking tasks as completed and uncompleted.

stories.title: Delete Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete a task so I can remove tasks I no longer need.

subtasks.title: Design Delete Task UI
subtasks.description: Add delete button and confirmation prompt to task items.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Handle delete action and update UI state.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task API (Backend)
subtasks.description: Create backend endpoint to delete a task.

subtasks.title: Test Delete Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for deleting tasks.

epics.title: Task List Display & User Experience
epics.description: Design and implement the user interface for displaying all tasks in a list, ensuring a simple, intuitive, and responsive experience across desktop and mobile browsers. This epic supports user engagement and satisfaction.

stories.title: Display All Tasks in a List
stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a single list so I can easily review and manage them.

subtasks.title: Design Task List UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and UI components for the task list.

subtasks.title: Implement Task List Rendering
subtasks.description: Develop frontend logic to render tasks dynamically.

subtasks.title: Test Task List Display
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for task list rendering and updates.

stories.title: Responsive Design for Desktop and Mobile
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile browsers so I can manage tasks from any device.

subtasks.title: Design Responsive Layout
subtasks.description: Create responsive wireframes and style guides.

subtasks.title: Implement Responsive Styles
subtasks.description: Apply CSS and frontend logic for responsive design.

subtasks.title: Test Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Test app on various devices and browsers.

stories.title: User Experience & Accessibility Enhancements
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to be easy to use and accessible so that everyone can manage their tasks efficiently.

subtasks.title: Accessibility Audit
subtasks.description: Review UI for accessibility compliance.

subtasks.title: Implement Accessibility Improvements
subtasks.description: Update UI components for accessibility (ARIA, focus, contrast).

subtasks.title: Accessibility Testing
subtasks.description: Test app for accessibility using tools and manual checks.

stories.title: User Feedback & Iteration
stories.description: As a product manager, I want to gather user feedback on the UI/UX and iterate on the design to improve usability.

subtasks.title: Conduct User Testing
subtasks.description: Organize and run user testing sessions.

subtasks.title: Analyze Feedback
subtasks.description: Review and synthesize user feedback.

subtasks.title: Implement UI/UX Improvements
subtasks.description: Make prioritized changes to UI/UX based on feedback.

epics.title: Performance, Quality Assurance, and Deployment
epics.description: Ensure the To-Do List application loads within 3 seconds, is robustly tested, and is deployed for public access. This epic is essential for meeting technical requirements and delivering a reliable product.

stories.title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline
stories.description: As a developer, I want automated build, test, and deployment pipelines so that releases are fast and reliable.

subtasks.title: Configure CI/CD Tools
subtasks.description: Set up tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or similar.

subtasks.title: Automate Build & Test
subtasks.description: Write scripts for automated build and test execution.

subtasks.title: Automate Deployment
subtasks.description: Configure deployment to staging and production environments.

stories.title: End-to-End Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to ensure the app works as expected by running comprehensive end-to-end tests.

subtasks.title: Write E2E Test Cases
subtasks.description: Develop test cases for all user flows.

subtasks.title: Automate E2E Tests
subtasks.description: Implement automated E2E tests using Cypress or Selenium.

subtasks.title: Bug Fix Verification
subtasks.description: Verify fixes for all critical bugs found.

stories.title: Performance Optimization
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to load within 3 seconds so I can access my tasks quickly.

subtasks.title: Optimize Frontend Assets
subtasks.description: Minify JS/CSS, compress images, and implement lazy loading.

subtasks.title: Analyze and Improve Load Time
subtasks.description: Use tools like Lighthouse to identify and fix performance bottlenecks.

subtasks.title: Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Test app load time on various devices and networks.

stories.title: Production Deployment & Monitoring
stories.description: As an IT admin, I want the app deployed to a reliable hosting environment with monitoring so that uptime and issues can be tracked.

subtasks.title: Provision Hosting Environment
subtasks.description: Set up cloud or on-prem hosting for the app.

subtasks.title: Deploy Application
subtasks.description: Deploy the app to the production environment.

subtasks.title: Configure Monitoring & Alerts
subtasks.description: Set up monitoring tools and alerting for uptime and errors.
